vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καλλῐ-έλαιος, ἡ,
garden olive, opposed to ἀγριέλαιος, [NT]:—feminine καλλῐ-ελαία, ἡ, [Refs 3rd c.AD+]: as adjective, κ. ἐλαία [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily adj. productive of good oil; as substantive a cultivated olive tree, Rom. 11:24*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 種植的橄欖樹，相對於野生的橄欖 (羅 11:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 种植的橄榄树，相对于野生的橄榄 (罗 11:24)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cây ô liu lành. καλλίον (G2566) + ἐλαία (G1636)
